amendment.description: To provide loan guarantees for major projects for certain renewable energy systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2131 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2131 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14143) To provide loan guarantees for major projects for certain renewable energy systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2131 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
